dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (playing the scene out

dialogues.text: Shrek attacks me, I pretend to be afraid. (he fake screams) Ooh!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I say... (he riffles through pages) "Finally the Kingdom will get the happily ever after they deserve, die Ogre", blah, blah, blah...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Without looking he stabs stand in #2. He falls to the gro Prince Charming is still frustrated.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh! It just doesn't feel real enough yet!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He throws the sword to the ground and turns toward the dancing villains who are staring at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who told you to stop dancing?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh... Wink and turn, wink and turn. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 87.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He throws the script on the ground and notices the stand-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And what are you laying around for? Get up! Honestly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Prince Charming storms off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Prince Charming storms into his colossal gold leafed dres room, its walls covered with posters of inspirational say and portraits of Prince Charming in different acting role

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Slamming the door, he plops down in his throne chair in f of a dressing table and large 3-way mirror. A statuette o his mother is on the vanity. He looks at it intently.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our happily ever after is nearly complete, mummy. And I assure you, the people of this kingdom will pay dearly for every second we've had to wait.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Charming adjusts the mirror, revealing a reflection of Sh standing in the doorway. Artie, Puss and Donkey stand alo side him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Prince Charming quickly stands up and faces Shrek.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Break a leg. Or, on second thought, let me break it for you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He walks across the room as Prince Charming backs against dressing table.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Prince Charming fumbles behind his back and pushes a butt under the counter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank goodness you're here. I was beginning to think you might not make it back in... time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shrek picks him up by the front of his shirt and scowls. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 88.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's Fiona?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't worry. She and the others are safe. For now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shrek strengthens his grip.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, a group of guards burst into the room and quick surround Shrek, Artie, Puss and Donkey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Prince Charming smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shrek looks around and realizes he's beat. He drops Charm with a thud.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Prince Charming brushes himself off as the guards surroun Shrek.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Prince Charming walks over to Artie. A smile grows across his face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let me guess... Arthur?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Artie looks indignant. He raises himself up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's Artie, actually.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This boy is supposed to be the new King of Far Far Away?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laughing, Prince Charming draws his sword and holds it up Artie's neck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How pathetic! Now, stand still so I won't make a mess.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shrek steps in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Charming, stop! I'm here now, you got what you wanted. This isn't about him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Artie is confused. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 89.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then who's it about? I'm supposed to be King, right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shrek hesitates and then gathers himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You weren't really next in line for the throne, okay? I was.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But you said the King asked for me personally.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not exactly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's that supposed to mean?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shrek becomes defensive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look, I said whatever I had to say, alright! I wasn't right for the job, I just needed some fool to replace me, and you fit the bill. So just go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Artie is stunned.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You were playing me the whole time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shrek fights back tears as he punishes Artie more.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You catch on real fast kid... Maybe you're not as big of a loser as I thought.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Puss (in Donkey's body) is about to interject when Donkey Puss' body) covers his mouth and signals him to stay quie

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know, for a minute there, I actually thought you -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What? That he cared about you? He's an ogre. What did you expect? Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 90.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Prince Charming signals the guards to release Artie. He stares at Shrek one last time and heads out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shrek lowers his head in shame.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You really do have a way with children, Shrek.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Prince Charming smiles and the guards lead Shrek off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shrek is led by the guards down the hallway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The scene cross-dissolves to Artie's back as he walks awa from the castle. He gives one last look back, and angrily storms away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shrek's ankles and wrists are shackled. Shrek pulls on hi chains. He sadly looks out the cell window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The scene cross-disolves to another prison window. Fiona comes to the window of her prison cell. She stares sorrowfully at the castle in the distance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All of the Princesses, the Queen and Fiona are locked up the same prison cell.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cinderella is frantically scrubbing a spot on the floor t shine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fiona looks out the cell window towards the castle in the distance. Behind her, Snow White paces around, complainin

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Had we just stayed put like I suggested, we could be sipping tea out of little heart-shaped cups... Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 91.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah... yeah, heart shaped cups.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eating crumpets smothered with loganberries.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah... loganberries.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shut up Cindy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, shut up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cinderella looks down at her reflection in the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No! You shut up!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just stay out of this!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who cares who's running the kingdom anyway?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I care.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fiona steps forward and challenges them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And you should all care too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, the cell door flies open. Donkey and Puss (in e other's bodies) are tossed in as the door is slammed behi them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in Donkey's body) Hey, hey, hey, hey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in Puss' body) Yeah, and I have your badge number,

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Puss, in Donkey's body, hisses and arches his back like a cat. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 92.

dialogues.speaker: FIONA, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Donkey?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in Puss' body) Princess?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Puss?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in Donkey's body) Lo siento, Princessa, but I am Puss, stuck here inside this hideous body.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in Puss' body) And I'm me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in Puss' body) I know, I know. Everything's a little fruity in the loops right now. But what happened is, we went to high school, the boat crashed, and we got "bippity-bopity-booped" by the "Magic Man."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You poor sweet things.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't get it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cat turned into a little horse that smells like feet. What's to get?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Huh? Who dat?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's Shrek? Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 93.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Charming's got him, Princess. And he plans on killing Shrek tonight in front of the whole kingdom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fiona's lets out a breath.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright everyone, we need to find a way out, now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Princesses nod in agreement.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're right. (to the other Princesses) Ladies, assume the position!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sleeping Beauty falls asleep standing up. Snow White quic assumes her position by lying down and puckering her lips Cinderella dusts off a spot, sits down and crosses her le

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Waiting to be rescued.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have got to be kidding me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, what do you expect us to do? We're just four...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I mean, three, super hot princesses, two circus freaks, a pregnant ogre and an old lady.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Queen smiles and then casually walks by the Princesse

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hmmm. Excuse me. Old lady coming through.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She walks right up to the brick wall, takes a deep breath lets out a yell.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiiiyyyiiiaaaah!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She head-butts a hole right through the brick wall. Fiona and the Princesses are impressed. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 94.

dialogues.speaker: PRINCESSES/PUSS/DONKEY
dialogues.text: Whoa.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mom!?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, you didn't actually think you got your fighting skills from your father, did you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fiona beams at her mother and then turns to the Princesse

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snow White points to another wall behind them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Excuse me, I think there's still one more.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Queen turns and sees the another wall barring their w

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hmmmm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Queen hurries to the other wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiiiiyah!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It crumbles, revealing the outside. The princesses wince.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fiona approaches her mother.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Queen turns around, this time a little woozy, singing softly to herself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why don't you just lie down?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Queen continues to sing to herself as she walks away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fiona turns to the others.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay girls, from here on out, we're gonna take care of business ourselves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snow thinks for a moment and then glances at the other Princesses. They nod.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snow looks determined. She rips off a sleeve, revealing a Dopey tattoo. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 95.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sleeping Beauty tears the bottom of her dress.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Queen puts lipstick smudges under her eyes (a la a football player).

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cinderella sharpens the heal of her glass slipper.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doris burns her bra.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Princesses place their hands over Fiona's. Puss and Donkey's hands come in last.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Captain Hook replaces his "hook" appendage with a "baton" taps it on the score in front of him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ladies and gentlemen. The Far Far Away Theatre at the Charming Pavilion is proud to present: "It's a Happily Ever After, After All."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The camera pulls back from a playbill that reads: "It's a Happily Ever After, After All - Starring Prince Charming himself."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two intimidating Evil Knights are handing out the playbil and are using spears to usher people into their seats.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Enjoy your evening of theatrical reverie, citizen! Oy! No food or beverages in the theatre! Hey!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The orchestra begins to warm up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The camera follows Rumplestiltskin as he hurries from the stage to backstage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SHREK stands atop a wooden platform, like a beaten man. Cyclops is binding his arms and legs with heavy chains attached to the floor. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 96.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He pulls the chains tight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oww, easy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry. I guess I was just showing off for the little one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Huh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's "Bring your kids to work day." C'mere beautiful.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cyclops motions to the shadows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CYCLOPS' DAUGHTER walks out from the shadows. She looks l Cyclops with long hair and skirt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shrek recoils.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well... she's got your eye.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cyclops picks her up and embraces her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who woulda thought a monster like me deserves something as special as you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They touch foreheads affectionately.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shrek looks at the two of them and then gets a determined look on his face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The camera booms down into some trees just outside of the castle. Fiona and the Princesses appear behind a log. Two Evil Trees guard the castle gate. Fiona uses a duck call signal Snow White. She skips down the path toward a side entrance, where two Evil Trees are standing guard. Snow White stops in front of them, singing our version of: "An Friends/With A Smile." Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 97.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Ahh ha ha ha ha haa."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The birds answer her in song.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Ahh ha ha ha haa."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The birds answer again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Ha ha ha ha haaaa. Little birdies take wing, flitting down from the trees they appear, and to chirp in my ear."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All the forest creatures flock to her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "All because I sing. Ahh ha ha ha ha haaa."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: More forest creatures flock to Snow White.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Ahh ha ha ha ha haaa."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Evil Trees stare in amazement.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Ha ha ha ha ha haaaaaaa!"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly Snow White's face changes. She transitions into Zeppelin's "Immigrant Song."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ahhaha!! Ahhaha!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All the animals turn and attack the trees. Fiona and the Princesses charge forward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Move it! Go! Go! Go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 98.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Donkey and Puss (in each other's bodies) run through fron gates of the Far Far Away Zoo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Dronkeys are held captive in the zoo. Donkey (in Puss body) busts open their cage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in Puss' body) My babies!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Dronkeys fly over to Puss (in Donkey's body) and hug

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in Donkey's body) Help! Ow!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in Puss' body) Hey!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Princesses run toward the castle. Doris punches throu the lock to open the gates.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As they enter the castle grounds, a group of guards runs towards them. Cinderella takes out a couple of them with boomerang crystal slipper. Sleeping Beauty falls to the ground, asleep. The guards trip over her body.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doris runs up to the foot of a canopy and takes a knee. T Princesses use Doris as a step to leap onto the canopy an over the castle wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Donkey and Puss (in each other's bodies) break Pinocchio of his marionette theatre.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 99.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gingerbread Man is locked inside a bakery display case. Donkey and Puss arrive (in each other's bodies). Donkey ( Puss' body) awkwardly tries to cut the glass open with hi claws. Puss (in Donkey's body) intervenes, quickly bashin hoof through the glass. They pull Gingerbread Man out of case.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fiona leads the Princesses and Queen, as they stealthily creep along the rooftop.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fiona peers around a corner and sees two guards blocking their path. She gets an idea.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Guards turn around to find a leg sticking out. They "ooh" and "aah" as they approach the leg. The camera pans to reveal Doris.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey. How's it going?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She kicks the guards to the ground, and they take off running.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Donkey, Puss, (still in each other's bodies) and the resc Fairy Tale Creatures run toward the castle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Donkey and Puss peek out from behind a bush.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in Donkey's body) "O" to the "K." The coast has cleared.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Donkey turns to address the Fairy Tale Creatures behind h Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 100.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in Puss' body) All right people, let's do this thing! Go Team Dy-No-Mite!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I thought we agreed we would go by the name of "Team Super Cool."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As I recall it was "Team Awesome."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I voted for "Team Alpha Wolf Squadron."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright! Alright! Alright! From henceforth we are to be known as "Team Alpha Super Awesome Cool Dynomite Wolf Squadron."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Three Pigs notice something.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ach to Lieber! There is some strange little girl over there staring at us!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Donkey, in Puss' body, turns to look. Artie is staring at the strange crew.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in Puss' body) Artie!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Artie turns and walks away. Puss, in Donkey's body, runs stop him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in Donkey's body) Wait, wait, wait, wait wait. Hey! Where is the fire, Senor?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Artie pushes Puss (in Donkey's body) out of the way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh please, don't act so innocent. You both knew what was going on the whole time and you kept it to yourself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Artie starts to storm away. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 101.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in Puss' body) Artie, it's not like it seems.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's not? I think it seems pretty clear. He was using me. That's all there is to it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Artie starts to walk off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in Puss' body) Using you? Man, you really don't get it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in Donkey's body) Shrek only said those things to protect you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This stops Artie in his tracks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in Puss' body) Charming was going to kill you Artie. Shrek saved your life.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Artie realizes the truth and is suddenly concerned for hi friend.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The lights dim.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The curtain rises.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rumplestiltskin orders for the spotlight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cue the spot!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A spotlight comes up on Rapunzel, singing in a tower whil the Fairy-tale Villains play their roles below. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 102.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "I wait alone up here. I'm trapped another day. Locked up here - please set me free. My new life I almost see, A castle, you and me. Yes, a castle you and me..."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Audience members look at each other in confusion; is this crap for real?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raul, the make-up artist, cries in the audience.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From the audience a knight holds up a candle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Up in the rafters, Rumplestiltskin cues the Cherubs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cherubs!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Cherubs (Evil Dwarves) are lowered onto the stage by rope and pulley system.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A spotlight appears on stage. From underneath the stage a clamshell rises and opens to reveal Prince Charming on horseback.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Tis I! Tis I! Upon my regal steed! Princess, my love, at last you shall be freed!"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Cherubs drop rose petals onto Prince Charming and the clamshell. Prince Charming and his steed, Chauncey, jump of the clamshell.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "I'm strong and brave, and dashing my way there! With speed! With might! With soft and bouncy hair!"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Prince Charming begins to make his way over to the tower.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Through the blistering desert..." Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 103.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Prince Charming chops the head off of the flying griffin puppet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Hot!"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Prince Charming dismounts, casually chops the head off of sea serpent and crosses the sea.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Across the stormiest sea."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Wet!"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He makes his way to dry land. He weaves in and out of the Evil Trees, who are playing the part of a forest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Facing creatures so vile!"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Foul!"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He casually cuts off the head of a wooden cut-out reindee and shoves a villain in a bear costume out of the way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "So you can gaze upon me!"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Prince Charming has made his way up the stairs at the bot of Rapunzel's tower.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "I knew you'd come for me. And now we finally meet."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "I knew you'd wait. And from my plate of love you'd eat." Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 104.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is a loud flash and a loud growling is piped throug the sound system and flares go off as a trap door opens i the stage floor. Prince Charming hams it up for the audience, putting his hand to his ear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rumplestiltskin cues Mabel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mabel is growling through a megaphone backstage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roar! Roar!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Three Evil Witches turn a lever and an Evil Dwarf blows s steam with a billow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A large, imposing shadow grows onstage. The silhouette fades, revealing a shackled Shrek on stage. He pulls at h chains as he notes the audience and views the spectacle before him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A crowd of fans, with "SHREK" written on their stomachs, cheer. One of the fans is hit with an arrow. They promptl sit down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Who is this terrible ugly fiend who so rudely intervened?"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pirates and Evil Knights dance in from the wings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Will Charming fight? Or will he flee?"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Oh please, rescue me!"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "From this monstrosity!" Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 105.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Prince Charming takes a dramatic pause and sings in an ul high voice of a castrato.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Fear thee not Honey Lamb! I will slice this thing up like a

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh boy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Prince Charming relishes the moment, pulling out his swor and aiming it at Shrek's chest. Prince Charming's voice climbs even higher.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You are about to enter a world of pain with which you are

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "FamiliaAAAAAAR!"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He holds the last, highest note. Shrek winces. Goblets, e glasses, a glass tiara and glass pearls all break in the audience.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Prince Charming smiles. Shrek looks at him with contempt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well it can't be anymore painful than the lousy performance you're giving.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The audience laughs at Shrek's remark. Prince Charming is thrown by their reaction.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From a trap door underneath the stage Rumplestiltskin tri to help Prince Charming out by feeding him his next line.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Prepare foul beast."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He clears his throat and tries to get back into character

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Prepare foul beast, your time is done."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oooh, if you don't mind could you kill me, and then sing? Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 106.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The audience laughs. Prince Charming gets in Shrek's face

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Be quiet!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, come on, I'm just havin' fun with ya. That's actually a very nice leotard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do they come in men's sizes?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The audience laughs again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He, he. Now that be funny.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crowd laughs again. Shrek smiles, enjoying how he's screwing up the show. Prince Charming is furious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crowd falls silent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Prince Charming turns back to Shrek.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now you'll finally know what it's like to have everything you've worked for, everything that's precious to you taken away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Prince Charming raises his sword.

dialogues.speaker: PRINCE CHARMING, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Now you'll know how I felt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly a fireball hits the blade, melting it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ahhhhh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Another huge fireball spreads across the sky as Dragon fl above the theater. The Dronkeys follow behind her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roar! Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 107.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Three Pigs come running down the aisle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sausage Roll!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Three Pigs leap onto the stage, going into a drop and roll move to land in between Shrek and Prince Charming. T strike a fighting pose.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pinocchio comes flying in on his strings, landing with a flurry of kung-fu hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Wolf unzips the wolf costume, steps out and joins the others.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Arg.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gingerbread Man pops up in the tower window, grabs Rapunz hair and swings down. Before he hits the ground, the end catches and he bounces like a bungee jumper. Her hair fal into a pile next to a very surprised Gingerbread Man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rapunzel screams. Her mousy brown hair crammed under a ha net. She runs off crying.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Prince Charming looks around, almost surrounded.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly a shadow falls over the crowd and they gasp. Dra and the Dronkeys fly in and land on the stage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Puss and Donkey leap off her back to the stage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in Puss's body) Pray for mercy from...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in Donkey's body) ...Puss!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He claps his hooves on the stage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in Puss' body) And Donkey!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He carves a letter "D" on Pinocchio's bottom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (re: his bottom) Hey. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 108.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Queen head-butts through one of the backdrops, with Sleeping Beauty and Doris. Snow White flies in behind the with the help of her woodland creatures ("Crouching Tiger Hidden Dragon" style). Cinderella runs on stage equipped a mop as her weapon. Together, the Princesses strike fier poses and stand next to Shrek.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The audience applauds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly the front door of the "swamp house" set crashes the floor, revealing Fiona.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hi honey! Sorry we're late. You okay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Much better, now that you're here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Awwwwwww!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The audience applauds. Shrek turns to Prince Charming raising his shackled wrists.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So Charming, you wanna let me out of these so we can settle this ogre to man?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Prince Charming considers this for a second.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oooh, that sounds fun. But I have a better idea!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Prince Charming strikes an imperious pose and claps his hands. Cyclops suddenly emerges from the trap door, knock Puss and Donkey down. He approaches them menacingly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The witches fly in and threaten the princesses with their brooms. The Evil Queen rises up behind the Queen and puts knife to her throat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Evil Dwarves grab The Three Pigs. Gingerbread Man is suddenly surrounded by many Evil Knights. He poops out a ball.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dragon starts to move forward only to find herself surrou by crossbows. A bunch of pirates grab Fiona and tie her u

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fiona! Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 109.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No! Let go of me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shrek struggles to free himself of the chains, but it's n use.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Prince Charming's eyes narrow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You will not ruin things this time ogre.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kill it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Prince Charming signals to the villains to attack Shrek. the villains advance towards Shrek, a spotlight shines in their eyes, stopping them in their tracks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everybody stop!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, what is it now?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Artie?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Artie jumps from the spotlight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Artie lands clumsily on a hanging cloud.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Artie leaps awkwardly from cloud to cloud. The audience stares in awe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: After one last leap, he swings down on the Cherub's cable sending the little person up in the air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Artie lands on the stage in between the Villains and Shre He stands facing the Villains.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who really thinks we need to settle things this way?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Evil Knights think about it and raise their hands. Th other Villains follow suit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're telling me you just want to be Villains your whole lives?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This gives the Villains pause. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 110.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But we are Villains. It's the only thing we know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Didn't you ever wish you could be something else?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Villains aren't convinced.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, it's easy for you to say. You're not some evil enchanted tree.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You morons! Don't listen to him!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Another Evil Tree covers Prince Charming's mouth and then motions to Artie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What Steve's trying to say here is that it's hard to come by honest work when the whole world's against you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right, thanks Ed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, fair enough. You're right. I'm not a talking tree. But, ya know, a good friend of mine once told me that just because people treat you like a villain, or an ogre...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Artie shares a look with Shrek.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... or just some loser...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Fairy-tale Villains listen intently.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...it doesn't mean you are one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Evil Tree tightens his grip as Prince Charming strugg to break free. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 111.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The thing that matters most is what you think of yourself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Artie commands the stage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If there's something you really want, or there's someone you really want to be, then the only person standing in your way ...is you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Artie points at Rumplestiltskin directly in front of him. Rumplestiltskin is alarmed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get `im lads!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, no, no! What I mean is: each of you is standing in your own way!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oooooooh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Headless Horseman breaks through the crowd.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've always wanted to play the flute.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Fairy-tale Villains and Creatures look at each other. The Evil Queen steps up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I`d like to open up a spa in France.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Villains nod in agreement.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I grow daffodils!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Complete silence as everyone stares at Hook.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And they're beautiful!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Captain Hook looks thoughtfully at his sword, then throws down. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 112.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The pirates throw theirs down, followed by the witches an Evil Knights. The evil knight holding Pinocchio is thinki about it when Pinocchio reaches over and takes the ax fro him. The weapons pile up in the middle of the stage. Ever else cheers and starts to mingle, introducing themselves shaking hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gingerbread Man high fives with an Evil Knight. Fiona is untied.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mabel walks up to Doris and lightly punches her on the ja Doris returns the sign of affection by punching Mabel in jaw, but a bit too hard, sending her falling to the groun

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, Prince Charming kicks himself free of the Evil and charges them. He grabs a sword from the discard pile raises it up, his aim set at Artie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aaaahhhh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Despite his fear, Artie faces Prince Charming bravely. As Prince Charming charges, Shrek finds the strength to brea his chains. Just before Prince Charming strikes, a chain whips into frame, wrapping around the sword. Shrek pulls Prince Charming around in a circle, away from Artie. Furi he charges Shrek and stabs him with the sword. Charming l go and Shrek stumbles back with the weapon impaled in him and falls to the floor, groaning.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Prince Charming beams, and laughs. He turns to the audien

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A new era finally begins!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The audience cowers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shrek looks up smiling and nods at Fiona and Artie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now, all of you, bow before your king!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shrek casually rises up behind him and clears his throat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah-hem.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Charming turns around. Shrek lifts his arm revealing that was never really stabbed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You need to work on your aim. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 113.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Charming is stunned.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This was supposed to be my happily ever after.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Prince Charming is paralyzed. Shrek drops the sword and g him by the shirt-front, lifting him off of his feet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He winces, but is still defiant.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well I guess you need to keep looking...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shrek looks at Fiona and at his friends and smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...cause I'm not giving up mine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shrek sets Prince Charming down and signals DRAGON. She casually tips the tower over with her tail. A shadow fall over Prince Charming. He turns and sees the tower falling toward him, his body perfectly framed up in the princesse window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mommy?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It crashes down and he's trapped inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the dust clears, the crown rolls across the stage. Art stops it with his foot and slowly picks it up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's yours if you want it, you know, but this time it's your choice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Artie considers it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks at Shrek, who is smiling proudly at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Artie turns to the audience and holds out the crown to th They cheer him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Artie places the crown on his head. The crowd goes nuts. the audience, Raul sobs with joy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ar-tie! Ar-tie! Ar-tie! Ar-tie! Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 114.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everybody cheers as the Fairy-tale Creatures and Villains Artie up on their shoulders and carry him off. Donkey and Puss, still in each other's bodies, watch as Artie gets carried away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In a puff of smoke, Merlin suddenly appears. He looks aro confused, clutching his show ticket.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh, excuse me, that's my seat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly he is thrown back against the front of the stage Donkey and Puss confront him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in Donkey's body) Okay, senor hocus-y pocus-y. The time has come to rectify some wrongs!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in Puss' body) Although I have been enjoying these "cat baths."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in Donkey's body) Please say you didn't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh... alright, alright...look..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merlin rubs his hands together.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're gonna feel a little pinch, and possibly some lower intestinal discomfort, but this should do the trick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merlin rolls up his sleeves, and prepares to make with th magic. He lets loose with a bright burst of magic. It tak moment for Donkey and Puss to recover. They eye each othe cautiously.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you..?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Donkey lifts his hoof and inspects it carefully.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm me again! Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 115.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Puss checks out his own paws.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And I am not you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Donkey and Puss give each other a big hug.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The two of them turn and walk away together.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merlin is behind them, smoking fingers and all. Suddenly eyes grow wide.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oops. Ah, never mind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see that Donkey still has Puss' tail and Puss had Donkey's. Merlin slips away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shrek and Fiona watch Artie in the distance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What'd I tell ya? I think the kid's going to be a great King.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, for what it's worth, you would have too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shrek smiles, and touches Fiona's belly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have something much more important in mind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They kiss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The camera pulls back to see everyone celebrating around Shrek and Fiona as they kiss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A wide-shot of a sunny morning in the swamp. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 116.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shrek grabs a "gourd" bottle and creates an ogre shake ou slug juice, eye balls and worms. He walk over to join Fio by the fire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah, finally.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shrek gives Fiona the "gourd" bottle and she places a nip on it. Two ogre babies crawl up onto Fiona's lap.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Da da.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A third ogre baby appears at Shrek's feet. He bends down pick him up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One big happy family of five. Shrek laughs and gives the babies and Fiona a hug.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The front door opens up to reveal Puss and Donkey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey! I smell Shrek Jr.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Dronkeys come swarming in behind Donkey. Dragon peers through the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shrek with a safety pin in his mouth is doing his best at changing diapers. He twists the diaper around and the bab goes flying off screen and lands in a diaper that Fiona i holding. She smiles at Shrek.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The swamp house is overrun with Dronkeys, ogre babies and dirty diapers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Puss sits next to an ogre baby that has a pacifier in his mouth. He takes the pacifier out of his mouth, shoves it Puss' mouth and gives Puss a big hug. Another baby comes crawling into frame and starts to tug on Puss' tail. A tu of war ensues.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ogre babies are bathing in a pot of water (a la a bea from the Nightmare scene). One of the babies farts in the water as Shrek comes in and scoops them up. Shrek laughs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Donkey is playing "peek-a-boo" with his ears. A baby ogre laughs. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 117.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peek-a-boo. Peek-a-boo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A baby ogre pulls ear wax from Shrek's ear. The baby uses the wax to draw squiggly lines on a piece of paper.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bouncy, bouncy, bouncy boy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Queen is bouncing a baby ogre on her lap. The baby pu and the Queen smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is a knock at the door. Donkey is laying on the flo holding a bottle with all four hooves, drinking the milk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shrek grabs the bottle out of Donkey's mouth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shrek opens the front door to reveal the Dwarf.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's the baby?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shrek puts a bottle into the Dwarf's mouth and slams the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fiona slides one of the babies down a "slip `n slide" mad out of mud shot from geysers. Shrek slides down himself. The babies scramble out of the way as Shrek slides by, spraying mud everywhere.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shrek and Fiona are diapering two of the babies in perfec unison. They continue diapering, Fiona holds up the third baby and Shrek holds up an unhappy, diapered Puss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shrek grabs a gourd bottle off of a shelf. He tosses it t Fiona. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 118.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fiona stands holding one baby over her shoulder. She catc the gourd thrown to her, twirls it around (a la Tom Cruis Cocktail), lifts up her leg where another baby is perched her foot and puts the gourd in the baby's mouth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shrek is burping a baby over his shoulder. The baby burps Fiona has a baby over her shoulder and the baby burps. A Dronkey sitting on a chair does a flame-belch and an ogre baby crawling by farts which causes a flame thrower effec into the fireplace.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shrek and Fiona tuck all the babies into bed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, what shall we do now?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shrek and Fiona are sound asleep, snoring.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A baby starts to cry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I got it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The camera trucks out.
